text: Jay Lockhart (born 3 February 1996) is an Australian rules footballer who plays for the Melbourne Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). He joined the team during the 2018 Pre-season supplemental selection period. He made his senior debut against Geelong in round 2 of the 2019 season.
